data.name: Unrepeatable
data.detailed_description:
Fight your way through a giant sudoku map battling with evil robots. Unravel this journey's mystery by completing levels. Use your mind, your heart, and your guts. Unravel the mysteries of this journey inside a cyberpunk-psychedelic environment. Remember, numbers can't repeat.

The gameplay is designed to be approachable to those who are complete strangers to sudoku. It starts with the most basic moves and slowly gets more complex through each level. While starting with "easy sudoku" for beginners, the game offers optional hard-sudoku and one-time-only time-attack sudoku challenges with cool prizes for more competitive players.

The gameplay revolves around stealth-action mechanics but with a slight addition of the sudoku.
The Player has a skill tree that has paths for making the sudoku/fight/stealth easier.

While eliminating these challenges, the player unravels the game's dystopic, philosophical and thought-provoking story with twists and turns.

data.supported_languages:
English*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 480, AMD Radeon 7870
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
